caption.p:
TX95 estimates by midcentury (2046–2055) computed from different RCMs: ( a) ICHEC-EC-EARTH; ( b) NOAA-GFDL-GFDL-ESM2M; ( c) NCC-NorESM1-M; ( d) CCCma-CanESM2; ( e) IPSL-IPSL-CM5A-MR; ( f) MPI-M-MPI-ESM-LR; ( g) CSIRO-QCCCE-CSIRO-Mk3-6-0; ( h) MIROC-MIROC5; ( i) ECMWF-ERAINT- MPI-M-MPI-ESM-LR; ( j) Standard deviation (STD) computed by using the spread of decadal TX95 estimates (2046–2055) from different RCMs (see plots a– i). In this figure, RCMs in plot 8f and in 8i were driven by the same GCM ( MPI- M- MPI- ESM- LR; see plot 9f). Plots were generated by using Python’s Matplotlib Library
92 .
